name: Crossed Roads
description:
http://www.hannabrady.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/... <-- might be better to play it here, since itch.io is cutting off some of the text.

"Crossed Roads" was written and designed for a WAG game jam. Along with exploring themes of "down the rabbit hole" and "empathy", it's an experiment in modular storytelling.

The story is told in scenes or 'loops', which are made up of twine passages -- narrative fragments -- that (hopefully) make sense no matter what order they appear in.
